failure.message: org.junit.ComparisonFailure: the result was 'The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfuss - Goodreads' but the expected is 'The Name of the Wind - Patrick Rothfuss'. expected:<...he Name of the Wind [- Patrick Rothfus]s> but was:<...he Name of the Wind [by Patrick Rothfuss - Goodread]s>
